title: Michael Lewis and Arianna Huffington
description: Michael Lewis discusses his new book, "The Undoing Project," and Arianna Huffington talks about "Rest: Why You Get More Done When You Work Less," by Alex Soojung-Kim Pang.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
